title: Kenya says it has given Adani Group contract to build power lines
description: Kenya has granted a $1.3 billion public-private partnership concession to India's Adani Group and Africa50, a unit of the African Development Bank, to build power transmission lines. This project aims to alleviate Kenya's debt burden. However, a separate plan to lease Jomo Kenyatta International Airport to Adani has sparked controversy and protests.
